C

Used to update the fields in the CalculatorModel when an action is performed
Calculator - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is responsible for launching the calculator application

CalculatorModel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class takes care of the calculations performed in the calculator.

This class creates the Splash Screen of the Calculator Application.

Initial constructor of the Splash Screen.
CalculatorView - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates the GUI of the Calculator Application.
CalculatorView() - Constructor for class CalculatorView
Initializes the CalculatorView GUI
CalculatorView.Controller - Class in <Unnamed>
This inner class reacts to the action of the buttons produced from the Calculator application
clear - Variable in class CalculatorView.Controller
Used to clear the JTextField (true == clear, false == keep appending Strings)
Controller() - Constructor for class CalculatorView.Controller
Initializes the fields of the Controller class to its default values

Used to create most of the buttons used in the Calculator Application

D

Used to display the action commands produced by the buttons.

Time the splash screen is displayed.

E

error - Variable in class CalculatorView
Used to display the state of the Calculator application
errorState - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Flag that indicates if the calculator is in error state (true if in error state false otherwise)

O

operand1 - Variable in class CalculatorModel
First operand obtained from the calculator
operand2 - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Second operand obtained from the calculator
operationalMode - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Operational Mode in the calculator (Integer(false) or float(true))
operator - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Operator used in the calculator (+ - * / sign or "none by default")
operatorUsed - Variable in class CalculatorView.Controller
Used to know if an operator was pressed (true if pressed and result not gotten yet, false otherwise)

P

PB_MINIMUM - Static variable in class CalculatorSplashScreen
0 Minimum value of the progress bar used in the splash screen.
performCalculations() - Method in class CalculatorModel
This method perform the calculations according to the fields previously set by the actions performed by the user in the Calculator.
precision - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Precision set in the calculator (1 place, 2 places or scientific notation)

R

result - Variable in class CalculatorModel
Result of the calculations being performed
